official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide individual income tax rate reductions and to repeal the phaseouts of the deduction for personal exemptions and of itemized deductions.

summary.text: Hidden Rate Elimination Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for a reduction in tax rates for individuals for calendar year 2002, as well as further reductions through calendar year 2006.Repeals the phaseout of personal exemptions.Repeals the overall limitation on itemized deductions.
